channel.title: 317; PvP
channel.description:
[center][size=30pt][font=verdana]3[u]1[/u]7[/font][/size] [i];DD Edited By [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=448086]Three One Seven[/url].[/i] [i]A nice small server project I've been working on for a few hours. I plan to release after I host it and see how it goes. If it fails I will edit to players whims, then release but if it's a success I will release once all the skills are implemented.[/i] [i]Original source ; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=356405.0[/i]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/nq8bgw.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2whkn06.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/swspvo.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/v5ljx4.jpg[/img]
[i]Jinrake[/i]'s server was very popular with alot of players online. As far as I'm concerned it's [i]deltascape[/i] edited for PvP, training + ...well more PvP. [b]It was one of the only servers that could implement the new runescape drop system [u]well[/u]. Also it's quite a stable source to have 200+ players.[/b] [font=verdana][size=20pt]Edits & Changes[/size] [size=15pt]Home area - Tutorial Island. (And only area.)[/size] 27/2/2010 - [i]Server compatible with silabsoft clients. + Silab items bonuses.[/i] [b]Prayer Edited:[/b] [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/1341/magez.png[/img] [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/998/range.png[/img] [img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/7646/melee.png[/img] [b]Also works with others; But three pictures of the same thing are enough proof.[/b] [i]Basic quest tab edited to show PvP stats; instead of quest menu. (Neat)[/i] [img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/6599/pvpstat.png[/img] [i]basic achievement cape store. (Closed chest in 'non-combat skill' area)[/i] [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/2961/storej.png[/img] [i]resources for skilling (Survival Expert in 'non-combat skill' area)[/i] [img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/9251/store2.png[/img] [i]four working fishing spots (pond in 'non-combat skill' area)[/i] [img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/3347/pondn.png[/img] [i]food & potions store (master chef at kitchen)[/i] [img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/4550/store7.png[/img] [i]armor store (runescape guide at main bank)[/i] [img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/7258/store6.png[/img] [i]shield sotre (quest guide in his house)[/i] [img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/5205/store5.png[/img] [i]mage supplies (magic instructor in his study)[/i] [img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/6854/store4.png[/img] [i]weapons (combat instructor underground)[/i] [img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/2703/store3.png[/img] [i]various teleports[/i] [img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/5957/38081641.png[/img] [img]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/8445/70893201.png[/img] [img]http://img687.imageshack.us/img687/8427/66242901.png[/img] [img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/1438/98449569.png[/img] [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/6395/15407705.png[/img] [img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/9162/38258769.png[/img] [i]archers shop ([s]mining instructor in underground mining area[/s] [u]financial advisor at home area[/u])[/i] [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/4155/store8.png[/img] [b]Also added trees + shops. Working on teleports.[/b] Rate/Hate. Will continue working & get completed by the end of the night. Hosting it now. Getting people to test and Ill get all glitches + bugs from there. [code]100% Jinrake for base server. I dont give myself credits.[/code][/center]

item.title: 317; PvP
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

[quote=“Berky-Scape, post:4, topic:330986”][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=427359.msg3138424#msg3138424 date=1267265898]
add proper icons for prayer, rather than having your character speak out loud
[/quote]

Rofl[/quote]

It’s just a silabsoft server test. Im just happy that theres some notification that shows if its on or off.

Read full topic

item.title: 317; PvP
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

[center][size=30pt][font=verdana]317[/font][/size]
;DD Edited By Three One Seven.

A nice small server project I’ve been working on for a few hours. I plan to release after I host it and see how it goes. If it fails I will edit to players whims, then release but if it’s a success I will release once all the skills are implemented.

Original source ; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=356405.0

[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/nq8bgw.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2whkn06.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/swspvo.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/v5ljx4.jpg[/img]

Jinrake’s server was very popular with alot of players online. As far as I’m concerned it’s deltascape edited for PvP, training + …well more PvP. It was one of the only servers that could implement the new runescape drop system well. Also it’s quite a stable source to have 200+ players.

[font=verdana][size=20pt]Edits & Changes[/size]
[size=15pt]Home area - Tutorial Island. (And only area.)[/size]
27/2/2010 - Server compatible with silabsoft clients. + Silab items bonuses.
Prayer Edited:

Also works with others; But three pictures of the same thing are enough proof.
Basic quest tab edited to show PvP stats; instead of quest menu. (Neat)

basic achievement cape store. (Closed chest in ‘non-combat skill’ area)

resources for skilling (Survival Expert in ‘non-combat skill’ area)

four working fishing spots (pond in ‘non-combat skill’ area)

food & potions store (master chef at kitchen)

armor store (runescape guide at main bank)

shield sotre (quest guide in his house)

mage supplies (magic instructor in his study)

weapons (combat instructor underground)

various teleports






archers shop (mining instructor in underground mining area financial advisor at home area)


Also added trees + shops. Working on teleports.

Rate/Hate. Will continue working & get completed by the end of the night.

Hosting it now. Getting people to test and Ill get all glitches + bugs from there.

100% Jinrake for base server. I dont give myself credits.[/center]

Read full topic
